span.span: ALL Spring sports have been canceled

span.strong: Click here to see a list of home learning resources for students in PreK-8th grade.

div.a: Morton Grove School District 70 will be closed beginning Monday, March 16th.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Out of an abundance of caution and to protect the health and safety of our community, Morton Grove School District 70 will be closed

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: through April 30th. We will

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: be keeping a close eye on the situation.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: to be taken to our registration site. Contact Jill Brocar at [email protected] or Alana McCloskey at [email protected] to make an appointment to finish the registration process. Appointments will begin on February 24th.

br.span: The first day of school for the 2020-21 school year is Monday, August 24th. Click here for a printable version of the calendar.

We will no longer be sending home paper report cards. Click HERE to watch a quick video on how to access your child's report card through your Parent Portal account. Questions or don't have a Parent Portal account? Contact Alana McCloskey at [email protected]
All yearbook orders must be placed directly with our yearbook company, Herff Jones. CLICK HERE to be taken to the website. Our school number is 3190. Please do not send orders to the school office.

div.span: Subscribe to Park View's School Google Calendar

span.div: If you would like to subscribe to Park View's School Calendar please click here. Once the calendar loads click the + Calendars button lower right side to add it to your google calendar. If you would like it in iCal Format click here

div.span: How to Pay by Credit Card for Lunch or School Fees

br.span: Here is a quick tutorial that walks you though our new Credit Card System. You have to be signed into the Parent Powerschool Portal to make payments. CLICK HERE

p.span: Click this
to be taken to our registration site. First create a new account then
complete the online process. Contact Jill Brocar
or Alana McCloskey at

span.span: to make an appointment to complete registration.

div.a: Morton Grove School District 70 Winter Weather Procedures

span.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic; font-weight: 700;

p.span: When is the decision made?

span.style: font-family: ArialMT; font-size: 12pt;

p.span: Every effort is made to make a final decision by 6:00 a.m. Notification will be posted on our website and we will send out automated phone calls and emails.

span.div: The Ducky Awards is the Celebrations Committee’s fun way of recognizing teachers and staff for going above and beyond to advance Park View’s mission of challenging, guiding and inspiring students.

br.span: Attached you will find the newly adopted strategic plan for Morton Grove SD 70. We also have the Live version posted on the website here.
The District Details is a newsletter that we send to the entire community three times a year to keep Morton Grove residents informed about what is happening in the district...

div.span: Access to the Parent Portal or Pay by Credit Card

br.span:
Our webpage has been updated! With the new look of our front page some items have moved. If you are looking to access the Power School Parent Portal you can click on button labeled "Parent Portal and Payments" in the blue bar under the picture on the main screen.
If you are looking for how to pay by Credit Card you can log into your Power School Parent Account and click on the button on the left menu called Pay Fees.
You can also find access to both of these under the "Family" tab on our website.
Click Here for direct link to the Parent Portal
